title: NEW VR Games & SHOCKING Haptic Vest From Gamescom 2023!
description:
Here are the best VR games and experiences from Gamescom 2023! I put together a roundup of all the virtual reality content I tried on the show floor including a shocking haptic vest and loads of upcoming VR games such as Arashi Castles Of Sin Final Cut on PSVR 2, Vampire Masquerade and a Quest game that gave me strong Dead Space vibes! 

Check out Arashi Castles Of Sin Final Cut here;
Quest - https://bit.ly/arashi-mike
PSVR 2 - https://bit.ly/3sEub77
Steam - https://bit.ly/3YYKIPh

Thanks to Skydance Interactive for sponsoring this video to make this trip to Gamescom possible.

Let me know what you're most excited for from the VR games and hardware I tried at Gamescom 2023 in the comments below.

13:29 - Gamescom VR Sum
